subject: Re: AW: Package SSN4248
description_text:
jasper diekmann <jasper.d@hotmail.de> schrieb am Mi., 14. Jan. 2026, 12:01:

> ---------- Weitergeleitete Nachricht ----------
> Von: jasper diekmann <jasper.d@hotmail.de>
> Datum: 15.12.2025 10:13
> Betreff: AW: Package SSN4248
> An: service@simsonn.com
> Cc:
>
> 1000099589.jpg
>
> <https://1drv.ms/i/c/0cacbd845acac1e7/IQDa--lW0473Q6Cg7p0q8zIzAeDMFg3RiaW6kRCnb0_M3gM>
> 1000099588.jpg
>
> <https://1drv.ms/i/c/0cacbd845acac1e7/IQDR4aolfconSagnW64ALKCXASFObSgbcCIGll_w6t65rkQ>
> 1000099590.jpg
>
> <https://1drv.ms/i/c/0cacbd845acac1e7/IQAsI5wceITGRaaXnJEQGOH1AYplKzE1mLikifH8-NQY2E8>
>
> *Subject:* Missing parts in my SIMSONN pedal order – Order SSN4248
> Hello SIMSONN Support Team,
> I’m contacting you regarding my recent pedal order *SSN4248*.
> Unfortunately, the delivery is incomplete and several parts are missing. I
> have attached photos as evidence and referenced the picture numbers below.
> *In this case, the issue is missing parts, not a functional defect.
> Therefore, it is unfortunately not possible to demonstrate the problem in a
> video.*
> *Missing items / issues:*
>
>    - *Black spacers are missing*, as shown in *photo (89)*.
>    - *Spacers and screws for my mounting/plate are missing*, visible in *photo
>    (88)*. The spacers and screws currently shown in the photo are my own
>    parts and were not included in your delivery.
>    - *The ground wire for the hub/controller is missing*, as shown in *photo
>    (90)*.
>    - Due to the number of missing parts, it seems that *one entire
>    package may not have been included in the shipment*.
>
> Please check my order *SSN4248* and arrange a *replacement shipment* with
> all missing parts as soon as possible.
> If you need any further information, please let me know.
> Thank you for your support.
> Kind regards,
> *Jasper Diekmann*
> *Attachments:*
> Photo 88 – missing spacers & screws
> Photo 89 – missing black spacers
> Photo 90 – missing ground wire
> ​​
> ------------------------------
> *Von:* service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
> *Gesendet:* Montag, 15. Dezember 2025 09:19
> *An:* jasper.d@hotmail.de <jasper.d@hotmail.de>
> *Betreff:* Re: Package SSN4248
>
> Hi jasper diekmann,
>
> Please provide a video or photograph demonstrating the defect or issue. We
> apologise for any inconvenience caused.
>
>
>
> Am So, 14 Dez um 10:59 VORMITTAGS , jasper diekmann <jasper.d@hotmail.de>
> schrieb:
> Des weiteren ist das erdungskabel ebenfalls nicht dabei
>
> Am 14.12.2025 16:45 schrieb service@simsonn.com:
>
> Hi jasper diekmann
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you
> a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/8214?follow=email
>
> Thank you for your patience.
> View ticket

conversations.body_text: Hi Jasper Diekmann,     We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will resend the items to you as soon as possible. Please confirm what the “Black spacers” refer to, as I noticed none of the Black spacers between the elastomers are missing.

The Black ones for the break... just send me plz the package....

service@simsonn.com

This is was i mean

Jasper Diekmann <diekmannjasper@gmail.com> schrieb am Mi., 14. Jan. 2026,
14:42:

> The Black ones for the break... just send me plz the package....
>
> service@simsonn.com
Hi Jasper Diekmann,    Here you go, this is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047241733601
